Texts.Eng: If I am to build a weapon from this Ion Core, I'm going to need some materials. Could you fetch me about ^orange;12 Superb Kavanite Plates ^white; and ^orange;5 Dranite Plates^white;? I'll work on some plans for the weapon in the mean time.
Those are perfect, Captain! Lucky for you, I just finished drawing the blueprints for the weapon I intend to build. I'll need some more materials, however.
